name: LedBlinker
description: The goal of this library is to provide a simple mechanism to control one or more status LEDs of your project: just configure the LED object (pin, level) and change the blinking pattern (as bitmask) and speed any time you want a new 'Tempo and Rhythm'.
keywords: leds, arduino, arduino-library, led, blink, blinker, non-blocking, led-blink
